entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 6:30 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

Temperature: 0.0°C

Visibility: 4.8 km

Dewpoint: 0.0°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to snow this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Snowfall amount 10 cm except 2 cm along parts of the coast. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
